name: Messenger with Supplies
effect:
*A lone rider on a battered horse catches up with your army.
They dismount, pull out a small package, and stagger toward you.
Gasping heavily, the messenger starts:
"Your... delivery... arrived..." After that, they faint.
You don't remember ordering anything...*
flavor_text:
A lone rider on a battered horse catches up with your army.
They dismount, pull out a small package, and stagger toward you.
Gasping heavily, the messenger starts:
"Your... delivery... arrived..." After that, they faint.
You don't remember ordering anything...
